About UPSSL

History and About United Photographic Society of Sri Lanka
  1. Home
  2. About

The History

The world faced a global epidemic coronavirus in March 2020 which is opened our eyes and made us learn something different about our life which we have not seen earlier.
S.Shanmuganathan, the founder of the UPSSL Association (United Photographic Society of Sri Lanka) who is initiated for this association and showed us the value of working together as a team, encouraged us more to achieve success. Similarly, we are paying tribute to Mr. Vinayagamoorthi who helped to build our association with his maximum effort.

By working together as an association which is can gain many unique privileges that cannot be measured by money those of us who are involved in the profession as Photographers. It is very essential to existing an Association like this to prevent and represent us form the troubles that we are facing.

Vision

The purposes of this organization shall be to encourage and promote member interest in all phases of photography, and to encourage active participation in the education of fellow members through sharing of skills and experiences to hold contests and present awards and to promote the photographic efforts of the membership through exhibitions and displays in the local area, when practical.

 

Mission

The purposes of this organization shall be to encourage and promote member interest in all phases of photography, and to encourage active participation in the education of fellow members through sharing of skills and experiences to hold contests and present awards and to promote the photographic efforts of the membership through exhibitions and displays in the local area, when practical.

Message from Founder - UPSSL

Mr. S. Shanmuganathan (President) 2023

 

The world faced a global epidemic coronavirus in March 2020 which is opened our eyes and made us learn something different about our life which we have not seen earlier.
S.Shanmuganathan, the founder of the UPSSL Association (United Photographic Society of Sri Lanka) who is initiated for this association and showed us the value of working together as a team, encouraged us more to achieve success. Similarly, we are paying tribute to Mr. Vinayagamoorthi who helped to build our association with his maximum effort.

By working together as an association which is can gain many unique privileges that cannot be measured by money those of us who are involved in the profession as Photographers. It is very essential to existing an Association like this to prevent and represent us form the troubles that we are facing.

The world faced a global epidemic coronavirus in March 2020 which is opened our eyes and made us learn something different about our life which we have not seen earlier.
S.Shanmuganathan, the founder of the UPSSL Association (United Photographic Society of Sri Lanka) who is initiated
